fields.name: game
docs: the game the entry relates to(32)

fields.name: entrant
docs: the pubkey of the entrant (32)

fields.name: amount
docs: the amount of entries (4)

fields.name: boosts
docs: the amount of boosted entries (4)

fields.name: cooldownEnds
docs: the timestamp of when cooldown ends (1 + 8)

fields.name: bump
docs: the bump if the entry account (1)

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority of the game (32)

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The token that can be used (32)

fields.name: teamWallet
docs: The wallet that will receive the team share (32)

fields.name: gameType
docs: The type of game (1)

fields.name: burnPct
docs: Percent basis points to burn (2)

fields.name: teamPct
docs: Percent basis points to send to team (2)

fields.name: prizePct
docs: Percent basis points to prize pool (2)

fields.name: price
docs: ticket price (8)

fields.name: startTime
docs: Time the game started (8)

fields.name: endTime
docs: Time the game ends (8)

fields.name: endgame
docs: The duration of the endgame period in seconds (1)

fields.name: duration
docs: Length of the game in seconds (4)

fields.name: lastPurchaseTime
docs: The time of the last purchase (8)

fields.name: lastPurchaseBy
docs: The pubkey of the most recent purchase (32)

fields.name: gameState
docs: The current state of the game (1 + 32)

fields.name: entries
docs: The total number of entries (4)

fields.name: balance
docs: The cumulative balance in basis_points (8)

fields.name: startingBalance
docs: The starting balance of the game (1 + 8)

fields.name: autoplay
docs: Does a new game start automatically after the last one finishes (1)

fields.name: complete
docs: Is the game concluded (1)

fields.name: prizeAuthBump
docs: The bump of the prize vault (1)

errors.name: GameNotStarted
errors.msg: This game has not started yet

errors.name: CannotStartInThePast
errors.msg: A game cannot start in the past

errors.name: GameNotCancelled
errors.msg: You can only withdraw from a cancelled game

errors.name: SomethingWentWrong
errors.msg: Operation cannot be completed do to an unknown error

errors.name: GameAlreadyCancelled
errors.msg: This game has already been cancelled

errors.name: CannotCancelInEndgame
errors.msg: Cannot cancel a game in the endgame phase

errors.name: InvalidShares
errors.msg: Shares cannot add up to more than 100%
